sigdist.description: set distance labels to display 2 decimals

sigang.description: Set angle labels to display 2 decimals places

cribbon.description: Color ribbon H red, strand yellow, loop green

coordinate.description: Coordinate covalent bonds to metals and H-bonds friom RNA.

drawHbonds.body:
hide everything, hydrogens
hide labels
set dash_color, ${1:black}${2:yelow} 
set dash_gap, 0.4
set dash_radius, 0.08
$0

hbonddash.body:
hide everything, hydrogens
hide labels
set dash_color, black 
set dash_gap, 0.4
set dash_radius, 0.08
$0

hidealtloc.body:
select altconf, alt ${1:b}  # select B alternative locators
hide everything, altconf  # hide alt B locators
$0

solventRadius.description: Set radius of ball used to make solvent accessible surface

scaleRadiusColor.description: Scale the radius and color of atoms as spheres by property in the B-value column.
